commit message:
Ensure the image url is unescaped before processing for display.

Fixes #2444

Merge pull request #3996 from wordpress-mobile/issue/2444-reader-private-images

Fix Broken Private Post Images in Reader Detail
Checking for non-null comment before trashing

Merge pull request #4005 from wordpress-mobile/issue/3982-null-comment-trash

Checking for non-null comment before trashing

Fix the script that auto generates the available languages array

We need the available languages to use the '_' instead of '-', so we can pre-select it in App Settings screen. This commit also adds a warning to that file, so we don't manually edit it anymore.
Don't change the language code to lowercase anymore, since available languages are not lowercase

Do not rewrite the Authorization Header when it's already available in the request.
Also make sure to use HTTPS when it's available.
fix ro strings in GlotPress and in the app
